Class NumericalNeutralFileGenerator

java.lang.Object
  femoop_test.NumericalNeutralFileGenerator

public class NumericalNeutralFileGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class gets as input a list of NumericalFileSection objects and to create a corresponding neutral file.
